benchmark_details.name: Llama3-SSL4EO-S12
benchmark_details.overview: The largest multispectral image-caption dataset for Earth Observation, consisting of one million Sentinel-2 samples with corresponding textual descriptions generated for contrastive learning.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To create a large-scale dataset of multispectral imagery with captions for improving vision-language models in Earth observation.

data.source: Multispectral imagery from Sentinel-2 satellites with generated captions.
data.annotation: Automated captioning using a multimodal large language model.

methodology.calculation: Calculated similarity scores between images and class labels for classification, and average precision for text-to-image retrieval.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy and mAP indicate better performance of the model.
methodology.baseline_results: Llama3-MS-CLIP achieves a top-1 accuracy of 58.54% and mAP@100 of 42.79%.
methodology.validation: Studied using zero-shot evaluation across three different datasets.
